EventInfo dataclass

Used to describe a motion event in detail after evaluated by ProcessState

class EventInfo.EventInfo(event_pos, event_code, part_id, deviated, misplaced, unnecessary, time_registered, removal, layout, completed_layouts, detour_event, error, part_not_picked, obstructed_obstacle, obstructed_part)

Bases: ProcessPlanning.pp_data_class.ConstructionState.ConstructionState

Dataclass containing information about a placement/removal/error event.

completed_layouts

The layouts that were completed by that action.

Type: Pos

detour_event

:ob:`Optional` [BuildingInstructions]

Type

Type

error

If an error occurred. Errors signify that an action occurred that should have been impossible in the context of the current process state.

Type: bool

layout

Layout where motion event happened.

Type: Optional [Trail]

obstructed_obstacle

Error specifier. If an obstacle was obstructed by a placement.

Type: bool

obstructed_part

Error specifier. If another part was obstructed by a placement.

Type: int

part_not_picked

Error specifier. If a part was not picked.

Type: bool

removal

If a part was removed.

Type: bool
